T02D2084:160a-1: shr'i rakta ya m'a ri s'a dha n'a ma /
T02D2084:160a-3: dpal gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2084:160a-5: gang gis dang por bdud bzhi bcom nas //
T02D2084:160a-6: sna tshogs sprul pas 'gro ba'i don du //
T02D2084:160a-7: mkha' la sprin bral nyi shar ji bzhin //
T02D2084:160a-8: phrin las g-yel ba med des skyongs shing //
T02D2084:160a-9: sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'dam gyis gos pa'i //
T02D2084:160b-0: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha mthar @160b 'phen byed //
T02D2084:160b-2: brtse ba'i sems kyis 'bad par byed do //
T02D2084:160b-3: de nyid nyams su len par 'dod pa'i //
T02D2084:160b-4: rnal 'byor gang des dben pa'i gnas su //
T02D2084:160b-5: skyabs 'gro sems bskyed sngon du byas nas //
T02D2084:160b-6: kun rdzob chos kyis stong pa'i ngang las /
T02D2084:160b-7: srung ba'i 'khor lo chos 'byung dbus su //
T02D2084:160b-8: bzhi bcas drug cu'i 'dab ldan chu skyes //
T02D2084:160b-9: steng du 'byung bzhi 'dus pa'i rdo rje //
T02D2084:160b-10: rgya gram lte ba la gnas bhr'um las //
T02D2084:160b-11: byung ba rnam par thar pa'i khang pa //
T02D2084:160b-12: steng 'og phyogs su mnyam pa'i gru bzhi //
T02D2084:160b-13: sgo bzhi sgo khyud sgo 'gram logs ldan //
T02D2084:160b-14: bcu drug ka ba'i steng na mdzes pa'i //
T02D2084:160b-15: rta babs snam bu'i bang rim rnams la //
T02D2084:160b-16: mi 'am ci sogs bu mo sgeg cing //
T02D2084:160b-17: mdzes pa'i rgyan ldan rnams kyis glu len //
T02D2084:160b-18: rlung gis bskyod pa'i nyi zla dang bcas //
T02D2084:160b-19: rin chen phreng ldan du ma rnams dang //
T02D2084:160b-20: bla re ba dang lang seng ka rgyan //
T02D2084:160b-21: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ri dgas dang ldan //
T02D2084:160b-22: 'khor lo sogs kyis logs la mdzes shing //
T02D2084:160b-23: 'khor lo'i rtse nas rin chen sna tshogs //
T02D2084:160b-24: pha gu sogs kyis khor yug brgyan pa //
T02D2084:160b-25: 'dod pa'i snam bu lha mor bcas shing //
T02D2084:160b-26: ka ba brgyad ldan rdo rje'i gdung bzhis //
T02D2084:160b-27: bteg pa'i thog la nyi zla rdo rjes //
T02D2084:160b-28: kun nas mdzes pa'i 'og gi gzhi der //
T02D2084:160b-29: sna tshogs pad nyi ma he'i gdan la //
T02D2084:160b-30: h'um las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ni //
T02D2084:160b-31: r'a ga'i mdangs ldan zhal gcig phyag gnyis //
T02D2084:160b-32: g-yas pa'i phyag na dbyug pa mi mgo / rdo rje bsnams la aom sogs yi ges //
T02D2084:160b-33: rim par mtshan pa mkha' la 'phyar zhing ;
T02D2084:160b-34: / g-yon pa bdud rtsis gang ba'i thod pas //
T02D2084:160b-35: rang dang 'dra ba'i yum la 'khyud pa //
T02D2084:160b-36: g-yas brkyang thal ba'i rgya spangs thod pa //
T02D2084:160b-37: skam po'i do shal 'phyang zhing 'khyud pa //
T02D2084:160b-38: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang ma he'i rva dang //
T02D2084:160b-39: tshang ra brdzis nas bdud dpung zil gnon //
T02D2084:160b-40: zhal gdangs mche gtsigs khrag gi thigs pa //
T02D2084:160b-41: 'dzag cing spyan gsum dmar po 'khrug pa //
T02D2084:160b-42: skra dang sma ra smin ma gyen brdzes //
T02D2084:160b-43: gar dgu'i nyams ldan rgyan kun dmar po //
T02D2084:160b-44: dar dang stag sogs gos kyis g-yogs pa //
T02D2084:160b-45: ye shes me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus na //
T02D2084:161a-0: sangs rgyas kun dang gnyis med @161a * //
T02D2084:161a-2: de yi thugs ka'i h'um gi 'phro 'dus //
T02D2084:161a-3: ye shes spyan drangs dgug gzhug byas la //
T02D2084:161a-4: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la dbang bskur //
T02D2084:161a-5: lhag pa'i chu la mi bskyod rdo rje //
T02D2084:161a-6: rang lus byung lha mo rnams kyis //
T02D2084:161a-7: mchod bstod bdud rtsis tshim par byas nas //
T02D2084:161a-8: h'um las byung ba'i spro ba sdu'i bzlas pas //
T02D2084:161a-9: sems can don kun rdzogs par byas la //
T02D2084:161a-10: slar yang thams cad h'um la bsdus te //
T02D2084:161a-11: phra mo'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhis rgyas gdab //
T02D2084:161a-12: chu la nya ldang ji bzhin tshul du //
T02D2084:161a-13: zung 'jug skur langs thun mtshams bya ba //
T02D2084:161a-14: ma lus byed pa sangs rgyas lam yin//
T02D2084:161a-15: dge ba 'di dang dge gzhan ma lus pa //
T02D2084:161a-16: gcig tu bsdus nas zung du 'jug pa'i sku //
T02D2084:161a-17: gshin rje gshed dpal go 'phang thob gyur nas //
T02D2084:161a-18: 'gro kun rnam mkhyen sa la 'god par shog /
T02D2084:161a-19: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
T02D2084:161a-20: lam gyi snying po zhes bya ba mkhas shing grub
T02D2084:161a-21: pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor chen po buddha dzny'a na
T02D2084:161a-22: p'a das au ga ya na 'bar ba'i phug tu
T02D2084:161a-23: da k'i shva ri badzra w'a r'a h'i nyid las
T02D2084:161a-24: dngos su thob nas lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par
T02D2084:161a-25: dag pas yi ger byas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2084:161a-27: // / yul dbus kyi pandita a'a nanda bha dra dang
T02D2084:161a-28: bod kyi lo ts'a ba se tsha bsod nams rgyal
T02D2084:161a-29: mtshan gyis grong khyer chen bo ti ra ha te'i
T02D2084:161a-30: lho phyogs rang byung gi mchod rten rnam par dag
T02D2084:161a-31: pa'i drung du yul dbus kyi dpe dang mthun par
T02D2084:161a-32: bsgyur cing bcos te gtan la phab pa /
T02D2084:161a-33: slar yang grub thob karna shr'i'i zhal snga nas gnas
T02D2084:161a-34: brtan nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis shr'i na lendra'i gtsug
